description:
*******************************************************************************************************

DESIGN SIMPLE PRINTABLES IN POWERPOINT & EARN $1,000s IN PASSIVE INCOME EVERY MONTH!

*******************************************************************************************************DID YOU KNOW?
You can create a wide variety of designs using Microsoft PowerPoint and not just boring slideshows! If you have creativity by your side, you can use PowerPoint as your canvas to design amazing quote printables.

And the best part?
You can create these printables in < 10 minutes and upload them online to earn passive income for life!

==========================================================================

NO PHOTOSHOP!

NO ADVERTISING!

NO PRIOR EXPERIENCE NEEDED!

==========================================================================

In this course, we'll provide a step-by-step process to create beautiful printable quotes in Microsoft PowerPoint using amazing techniques. We will also show you where to sell these designs online, to make money!

NOTE: All the online tools/resources discussed in this course are closely related to the course material and are necessary to enhance your learning. Some of these tools may require a free sign-up, to access them. We do not have any affiliation with the sites discussed here.

COURSE STRUCTURE:

The course is structured into 5 key sections:

  1. The first section is the INTRODUCTION, which includes the course overview and key takeaways.
  2. The second section provides details about FREE RESOURCES available to aid your design efforts.
  3. The third section deals with CREATING YOUR FIRST PRINTABLE using PowerPoint.
  4. The fourth section deals with SELLING THESE PRINTABLES online!
  5. And finally, section five is the CONCLUSION, which includes the next steps and additional resources to make the best use of this course.

So, by the end of this course, you will be able to create and sell amazing printables and have a lot of fun, too!

Let’s dive in right away. I’ll see you on the other side!
title: Quote Printables: Create Quote Posters In PowerPoint (PC)
